local_intent: Confirm handle grasp, open the drawer if not already open, and verify it is open.
assumptions: Handle is already grasped from prior steps
Tool yaw/orientation and alignment were achieved upstream
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence by checking grasp then executing OpenContainer(target=drawer, container_type=drawer, timeout_ms=1500) and verifying with ContainerOpen; avoids redundant action via Fallback.
